name: WaterReminder
0:
”Alexa, open Water Reminder”
”Alexa, start Water Reminder”
”Alexa, launch Water Reminder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water reminder
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Water Reminder will remind you to drink water every hour, for a total of 8 hours in a session. To extend the hours, simply relaunch the skill by saying "Alexa, launch water reminder".

Water reminder is perfect for those who regularly forget to drink water due to their busy schedule. With a gentle reminder every hour, water reminder will ensure that you never forget to drink a glass of water again.

Water reminder does not work on a fixed schedule, and instead sets hourly reminders for a total of 8 hours from the time you launch the skill. For example, if you launch the skill at 8am, your first reminder will be due at 9am, and your last would be at 4pm. 

To cancel all pending reminders, just say "Alexa, cancel water reminders" or "Alexa, cancel all reminders".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
